title: Personalized Mathematics Instructional Design Through Learner Engagement Profiling

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement course for pre-service or in-service teachers, focusing on strengthening mathematics education competencies for pre-service teachers. Combines smartphone-based online activities with face-to-face workshops, measuring learning outcomes through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Three data collection tools can be designed to analyze learning engagement patterns
A personalized mathematics lesson design document reflecting learner profiling results can be created
Three or more participation metrics can be derived using VLE (Virtual Learning Environment) log data

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
